name: General's Game Pro
description:
Play a strategy board game
Player options:
*** Play with Computer
*** 2 Player Game via bluetooth
*** 2 Player Online Game via Game Center
*** Pre-setup game multilevel scenarios

Rules:
- Only one grid per move allowed.
- The higher rank piece win. All officers can be eliminated by a Spy.
- A Spy can be eliminated by a Private Officer.
- To move, select piece and tap adjacent grid.
- To attact, select your piece and place over to the enemy location.
- To win, capture enemy flag or eliminate all enemy officers.
- You can arrange your pieces at strategic position
